author: akara
msg: OLIO-74: Using servlet.lib.path instead of tomcat.home property to indicate where the libraries are located. This will work with any servlet library.

author: akara
msg: thus allowing it to build on just about any servlet library.

author: jonesde
msg: A few changes to fix issues with the catalog search engine friendly urls when ecommerce is mounted on the root of the server, as reported in Jira #OFBIZ-2238; there was an issue with 2 forwarded slashes at the beginning instead of one, and the servlet mount of catalog conflicted with the catalog webapp, so changed that to products

author: jdumay
msg: MRM-1139 - war:inplace blindly copies everything (including WEB-INF/lib/**) into the archiva-webapp.

author: ddas
msg: Merge -r 753111:753113 from trunk onto 0.19 branch. Fixes HADOOP-5449.
